AbstractReportWriter - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.report
Abstract class that should be extended by all ReportWriter implementations to support writing reports to files and writing to console.

AlternativeTextForAppletRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.media
AlternativeTextForAppletRule ensures that every <applet/> within the given HTML document provides an alternative textual description to explain the <applet/> to everyone who is not able to view and display the <applet/> itself.
AlternativeTextForAppletRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.media.AlternativeTextForAppletRule
 
AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images
AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule ensures that every area of an image map created by the <area/> tag within the given HTML document provides an alternative text through its alt attribute.
AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images.AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule
 
AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.forms
AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule ensures that every image button created through <input type="image"/> within the given HTML document provides an alternative text through it's alt attribute.
AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.forms.AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule
 
AlternativeTextForImageRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images
AlternativeTextForImageRule ensures that every image created by the <img/> tag within the given HTML document provides an alternative text through it's alt attribute.
AlternativeTextForImageRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images.AlternativeTextForImageRule
 
AlternativeTextForInlineFrameRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.frames
AlternativeTextForInlineFrameRule ensures that every inline frame marked through <iframe/> within the given HTML document provides an alternative textual description inside it's body to explain the inline frame or a hyperlink to an alternative version of that inline frame.
AlternativeTextForInlineFrameRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.frames.AlternativeTextForInlineFrameRule
 
AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images
AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule ensures that every image created by the <img/> tag within the given HTML document that is part of a hyperlink created by the <a/> tag provides a non empty alternative text through it's alt attribute.
AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images.AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule
 
AlternativeTextForObjectRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.media
AlternativeTextForObjectRule ensures that every <object/> within the given HTML document provides an alternative textual description to explain the <object/> to everyone who is not able to view and display the <object/> itself.
AlternativeTextForObjectRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.media.AlternativeTextForObjectRule
 
AnchorsWithoutTargetAttributeRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.links
AnchorsWithoutTargetAttributeRule ensures that no anchor <a/> tag within the given HTML document contains the target attribute that forces a link to open in a specific or new window.
AnchorsWithoutTargetAttributeRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.links.AnchorsWithoutTargetAttributeRule

AvoidBlinkTextRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text
AvoidBlinkTextRule ensures that every <blink/> element within the given HTML document leads to a violation because the <blink/> tag result in blinking text that cannot be stopped and it is not defined in any W3C HTML specification.
AvoidBlinkTextRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text.AvoidBlinkTextRule
 
AvoidBoldTagRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text
AvoidBoldTagRule ensures that every <b/> element within the given HTML document leads to a violation because the <strong/> element should be used to outline important text.
AvoidBoldTagRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text.AvoidBoldTagRule
 
AvoidItalicTagRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text
AvoidItalicTagRule ensures that every <i/> element within the given HTML document leads to a violation because the <em/> element should be used to outline important text.
AvoidItalicTagRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text.AvoidItalicTagRule
 
AvoidMarqueeTextRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text
AvoidMarqueeTextRule ensures that every <marquee/> element within the given HTML document leads to a violation because the <marquee/> results in moving text that cannot be stopped and it is not defined in any W3C HTML specification.
AvoidMarqueeTextRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text.AvoidMarqueeTextRule
 
AvoidMetaRefreshRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.interactions
AvoidMetaRefreshRule ensures that there is no fixed refresh caused by the <meta http-equiv="refresh" content="seconds; URL=target"/> tag within the given HTML document.
AvoidMetaRefreshRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.interactions.AvoidMetaRefreshRule
 
AvoidServerSideImageMapRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images
AvoidServerSideImageMapRule ensures that there are no server side image maps created by the <img ismap="ismap"/> tag within the given HTML document because they are inaccessible by users who cannot use a mouse because of some disability.
AvoidServerSideImageMapRule() - Constructor for class de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images.AvoidServerSideImageMapRule

C

CaptionTextForTableRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.tables
CaptionTextForTableRule ensures that every <table/> within the given HTML document provides a title by having a <caption>description</caption> element as the first child element inside the <table/> declaration.

L

LabelContainsTextRule - Class in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.forms
LabelContainsTextRule ensures that every <label/> within the given HTML document contains a textual representation for the given label.
